name: Amanita Library
short_description: A set of platform independent utility and wrapperclasses in C++. This library contains amongst others a regex engine, hashtable and vectorclass, and a randomgenerator. SDLwrapperclasses for fonts and images, GUI, server and client and a httpclient.
